Experience
  • Quality Manager Jan – Aug 2019
    Civil Maps, Hyderabad, India

    - Civil maps is providing city scale HD maps for Autonomous self driving cars.
    - I was working for Team MapX which is providing end to end solutions for Lidar data sets.
    - My team’s responsibility was to process the Lidar data sets and loop close it with the ground control points.
    - Worked on starting from loop close the lidar data sets to creation of Geo Features on point cloud to create the symmentic relation.
    - We achieved 20 cm of global reference accuracy with Lidar data sets of terrestrial and airborne.
    - For more info introducing-city-scale-hd-maps check the link.

  • Team Lead June 2016 –Dec 2018
    Uber Technologies, Hyderabad, India

    - Managed a Team of 40 employees working for self-driving mapping project for final quality checks and city delivery in Client location from Accenture solutions
    - Worked closely with the clients to provide immediate solution of issues.
    - Worked on new processes, stabilized them and created highest production with good quality.
    - Delivered 40+ cities while working on the project.
    - Managed the Team with less than 5% of attrition and 8% of shrinkage during my tenure.

  • Team Lead Feb 2015 –Jun 2016
    Ceinsys Tech Ltd (Formally ADCC Infocad Limited) , Nagpur, India

    - Headed a Team of 40+ Employees worked in Mapping and GIS Project for End to end mapping and city delivery.
    - Worked for India mapping operations for Point of interest, Base Map Creation and Different types of Attributes.
